review: Where do I start? Plugged into TV. Setup went fairly quick.Tried to watch a couple of movies. Got the dreaded running circle in the center - Buffering. OK, show started. Here comes the circle again. Says no internet connection. Check internet and it says (Very Good). Went back to movie and it started up and then got the circle again. Well after about 20 something times. Reset router. Changed connection on TV. Removed the adapter. All with the same results.Then tried to search for my TV shows. They have them, but you have to PAY per episode. $1.99 to $2.99 each. Almost everything you want to watch is PAY PER VIEW!This does get Really HOT.As the circle turns and turns and TURNS...
author: toobad "toobad"

review: This turned my old 7 year old HDTV to a smart TV.  I not tech savvy and went on a You-Tude instructional video.  Did not even watch it for 2 minutes.  Once I got over my fear, set up was one easy as 1,2,3.  I am using Amazon Prime and Netflixs but there is still so much more.  Really enjoy watching movies on TV than on my I-Phone.  Would decently recommend to friends.  Wish I would have purchased soon.
